item.description:
Join us for some gaming on a Thursday evening. We will figure out from choices of a few games what one to play. I have some new games that it would be great to get them on the table. Please only RSVP yes if you are going to attend. Hope to see some of you there! Questions please let me know.

End time: 7:45PM

Being as we are holding this gaming session in a store there are a few rules we need to follow. Nothing outrageous.

Rule for the Venue:
1.) No food or Drink is allowed in the store.
2.) Be respectful to other customers.
3.) Be willing to explain the game to anyone who asks or direct them to me.
4.) Keep the noise level controllable.
5.) Be out of the store by Closing (8pm). (We can stay and chat outside if we need)

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: First game night of 2010! Thursday night Gaming!
